ai.grakn.graql.admin

Interface ReasonerQuery

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReasonerAtomicQuery, ReasonerQueryImpl

    public interface ReasonerQuery

    Interface for conjunctive reasoner queries.

    Author:
    Kasper Piskorski

        Parameters:
